Subject: Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by SPG

A copy of DGCA permit No. 358-AA/2013, issued under reference No.
8/95/2005-IR dated 04.06.2013 regarding authorization to the Special Protection Group
Personnel for carriage of arms and ammunition by air to/from any point within India,
is forwarded herewith for information and necessary action by all concerned.
2.
